short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seventeen wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Seventeen Kpop background. Seventeen wallpaper background theme for K-pop fans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Experience a new Seventeen Kpop wallpaper each time you open a tab.
2. Customize your background from a selection of Seventeen k-pop wallpapers or set your favorites via the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links for quick access to your emails and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature allows you to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Streamlined access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add websites to your Shortcut panel for swift navigation.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore additional themes with ease.
12. Share content effortlessly on social media.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Instant access to a variety of games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Seventeen new tab.
